ุงูุฑูุฒ ฺฏุฒุงุฑุด ุฏุฑ ุจุงุฒุงุฑ ููุฒุงุช ุดุงูฺฏูุง ููุชุดุฑ ุดุฏู ฺฉู ุจู ุชุญูู ููุถูุน ููพุฑุฏุงุฒุฏ. ุฎูุงุตู ุขู ุจุดุฑุญ ุฒุฑ ุงุณุช:

ุจุฑุฎ ุชุญูู ฺฏุฑุงู ุงุนุชูุงุฏ ุฏุงุฑูุฏ ุจุง ุชูุฌู ุจู ูุญุฏูุฏู ุณูุฏ ุฎูุจ ูุนุฏู ฺฉุงุฑุงู ุจุฒุฑฺฏ ุฏุฑ ุงู ููุชุ ููฺูุงู ุงุญุชูุงู ุฑููุฏ ฺฉุงูุด ุฏุฑ ุขู ุท ุฑูุฒูุง ุขูุฏู ูุฌูุฏ ุฏุงุฑุฏ!

2- ุจู ููุงุฒุงุช ฺฉุงูุด ููุช ุณูฺฏ ุขููุ ูููุงุฏุณุงุฒูุง ฺู ุญุงูุง ุดุฑูุน ุจู ุงุตูุงุญ ุฑููุฏ ุชููุฏ ู ฺฉุงูุด ุขู ุฏุฑ ุชูุงุณุจ ุจุงุฒุงุฑ ูููุฏู ุงูุฏุ ุงูุฑ ฺฉู ูุชูุงูุฏ ูุดุงุฑ ุจุฑ ุงู ูุงุฏู ูุนุฏู ุฏุฑ ุฑูุฒูุง ุขูุฏู ุฑุง ุงูุฒุงุด ุฏูุฏ.

@Commodities ฺฉุงููุฏุช
D
Du Rove's Channel 04.11.2015 20:05:06
Finally some good news for our Iranian users.

A couple of weeks ago Telegram stopped working in Iran, so I assumed we had been blocked there. However, service has since returned to normal, and the Iranian Ministry of Information and Communication declared they were not going to block Telegram.

The interruption of service, they say, was due to the disruption of cables connecting Iran with the rest of the world (Suez Canal, Mandeb Strait + Iran-Turkey cables), and the poor connectivity affected most western services in Iran โ not just Telegram.ย

Moreover, the government denied that they required any kind of spying tools from Telegram, saying that the demand I received was fake and not authorized by any higher authorities.

Iโd like to believe that this is true โ it would mean that the Iranian people will continue to be able to use what I maintain is the best messaging service on the market. And since our system administrators confirm that the Iranian governmentโs report of cable disruption is probable, my earlier claim about Telegram getting blocked may have been inaccurate (or at least premature).ย

In that case, sorry for the false alarm, everyone. Itโs easy to misinterpret the situation in markets that have a history of internet censorship โ you might have heard that Facebook and Twitter have been blocked in Iran for a few years. However, this doesnโt mean that Telegram can't be blocked there in the future.

Iranian authorities made it clear that they would block Telegram if it contained publicly available porn, i.e. porn bots and porn channels. If this is the only matter that poses a concern, there will hardly be any problem, since we already block most porn bots and channels anyway due to App Store restrictions.ย

Anyway, the bottom line: weโre good in Iran. For now. And letโs hope for the bestย๐
@

3- ุฑุนุงุช ููุช 20 ุฏููู ุฏุฑ ุงุฑุงู ฺฏุฒุงุฑุด ุณุฎูุฑุงูุงู ุจุณุงุฑ ุฏุฏู ูุดุฏ. ุณุฎูุฑุงู ูุง ุทููุงู ูุจูุฏ...

ฑ- ุณุทุญ ุณุงุณ ูุดุงุฑฺฉุช ฺฉุดูุฑูุง ุนุถู ุฌ.ุง.ุณ.ุงู ุฏุฑ ุจุงูุงุชุฑู ุณุทุญ ุจูุฏู ู ุณุฑุงู ฺฉุดูุฑูุง ุฏุฑ ุงู ุงุฌูุงุณ ุญุถูุฑ ุฎูุงููุฏ ุฏุงุดุช.

ูุฑุฏุง 2 ุดูุจู ุฑูุจุฑุงู ฺฉุดูุฑูุง ูุฎุชูู ุฏูุง ุดุงูู ุขูุง ุงูุจุงูุง (ุงูุฑฺฉุง)- ุฒ ุฌููพูฺฏ (ฺู)- ฺฉุงูุฑูู (ุงูฺฏูุณ) ู ุฎุงูู ูุฑฺฉู (ุขููุงู) ุฏุฑ ูพุงุฑุณ ฺฏุฑุฏ ูู ู ุขูุฏ ุชุง ุจุญุซ ฺฉุงูุด ุชููุฏ ฺฏุงุฒูุง ฺฏูุฎุงูู ุง ุฑุง ุฏุฑ ุฏูุง ูุงูููููุฏ ฺฉููุฏ. ุฏุฑ ฺฉููุฑุงูุณ 50 ูุฒุงุฑ ููุฑ ุดุฑฺฉุช ูฺฉููุฏ ฺฉู ูู ุงุฒ ุขููุง ููุงูุงุช ุฑุณู ุดุฑฺฉุชูุง ูุณุชูุฏ!

ูุฏุฑุช ฺฏุงุฒูุง ฺฏูุฎุงูู ุง ูุชูุงุฏ ุจุฑ ฺฉุงูุด ูุตุฑู ุณูุฎุชูุง ูุณู ูุซู ุฒุบุงูุณูฺฏ ู ููุช ุฎุงู ุงุซุฑ ุฒุงุฏ ฺฏุฐุงุฑุฏ ฺฉู ุงุฑุงู ุงุฒ ุขู ุชุงุซุฑ ุฎูุงูุฏ ฺฏุฑูุช.

ุณุงุฒูุงู ููู ูุดุงุฑ ุฒุงุฏ ุจุฑ ฺฉุดูุฑูุง ุจู ููุธูุฑ ุงุฌุงุฏ ฺฉ ุฒุฑุณุงุฎุช ูุงููู ุจู ููุธูุฑ ุงูุฒุงู ฺฉุดูุฑูุง ุจู ุฑุนุงุช ุงู ุงูุฑ ุฏุงุฑุฏ.

ุงู ฺฏุฒุงุฑุด ุฏุฑ ุจุฎุด ูุฑุตุช ูุงุ ฺุงูุดูุง ู ุงูุฒุงูุงุช ููููุช ุจู ุจุฑุฑุณ ุงุฑุงู ู ูพุฑุฏุงุฒุฏ:
